summary:
- **Buy-back Type**: On-market buy-back  
- **Total Buy-back Program**: Up to **$400 million** of ordinary shares  
- **Buy-back Period**: From **28/3/2025** to **27/3/2026**  
- **Shares Repurchased as of 22/7/2025**: **207,501** (on previous day), **9,608,091** (cumulative)  
- **Total Consideration Paid**: **AUD 4.4 million** (previous day), **AUD 182.7 million** (cumulative)  
- **Price Range**: **AUD 20.86–21.38** (previous day), **AUD 16.95–21.23** (historical range)  
- **Broker**: Goldman Sachs Australia Pty Ltd  
- **Conditionality**: Subject to market conditions; may be varied/suspended.  

*No material changes to capital structure or liquidity beyond disclosed buy-back execution.*
